00010 #if !defined(APPLICATION_TRACER_HPP)
00011 #define APPLICATION_TRACER_HPP
00014 
00015 #if !defined(APOXI_APPLICATION_TRACER_MAX_APPS)
00016     #define APOXI_APPLICATION_TRACER_MAX_APPS 50
00017 #endif

00020 class  _NullApplicationTracer {
00021     public:
00022         _NullApplicationTracer(const void* app) {}
00023         void TraceAttach(const void* app, const void* container, const WCHAR* appName) {}
00024         void TraceDetach(const void* app) {}
00025         void TraceMessage(const void* msg) {}
00026         static UINT8 GetCurApplicationID() { return 0; }
00027 };  //_NullApplicationTracer
00028 
00029 class  _ApplicationTracer {
00030     public:
00032         _ApplicationTracer(const void* app) {
00033             AddApplication(app);
00034         }
00035         
00037         void TraceAttach(const void* app, const void* container, const WCHAR* appName) {
00038             const void* linkreg=0;
00039             #if defined(APOXI_RTOS_NUC32)
00040                 // get linkregister, contains caller address
00041                 #if (__ARMCC_VERSION<200000)
00042                     __asm
00043                     {
00044                         mov linkreg,r14
00045                     }
00046                 #else
00047                     linkreg = (const void*) __return_address();
00048                 #endif
00049             #endif
00050             InternalTracer::TraceAppAttach(linkreg, app, container, appName, GetID(app));
00051         }
00052         
00054         void TraceDetach(const void* app) {
00055             const void* linkreg=0;
00056             #if defined(APOXI_RTOS_NUC32)
00057                 // get linkregister, contains caller address
00058                 #if (__ARMCC_VERSION<200000)
00059                     __asm
00060                     {
00061                         mov linkreg,r14
00062                     }
00063                 #else
00064                     linkreg = (const void*) __return_address();
00065                 #endif
00066             #endif
00067             InternalTracer::TraceAppDetach(linkreg, app, GetID(app));
00068         }
00069         
00072         static unsigned char GetCurApplicationID();
00073         
00074         
00075     private:
00076         enum {
00077             MAX_APPS = APOXI_APPLICATION_TRACER_MAX_APPS
00078         };
00079         
00080         static const void* g_apps[MAX_APPS];
00081         static UINT8 g_appID;
00082         
00083         static void AddApplication(const void* app) {
00084             if (g_appID < MAX_APPS-1)
00085                 g_apps[++g_appID] = app;
00086         }   // AddApplication
00087         
00088         
00089         static UINT8 GetID(const void* app) {
00090             for (UINT8 i=0; i<=g_appID; i++) {
00091                 if (app == g_apps[i])
00092                     return i;
00093             }
00094             return 0;
00095         }   // GetID
00096         
00097 };  // _ApplicationTracer
00098 
00099 
00101 #endif // APPLICATION_TRACER_HPP
